#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100005
#define BASE 31
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 
 
int main(){
	int t,m,i;
	string s;
	cin>>t;	
	while(t--){
		cin>>s;
		cin>>m;
		int cnta=0,ans=1e9;
		for(i=0;i<m;i++){
			if(s[i]=='A')
			cnta++;
		}
		ans=min(ans,m-cnta);
		for(i=m;i<s.length();i++){
			if(s[i-m]=='A')
			cnta--;
			if(s[i]=='A')
			cnta++;
			ans=min(ans,m-cnta);
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
